quest.name: Impish Implications
journal: Lululo of the Golden Bazaar wants the vandalous imps terrorizing her dig site to be put down.

Lululo wants to search for veins of mythril among the ruins to the east. The appearance of vandalous imps, however, has scared off the miners she hired to dig. Cull four of the imps to keep the others at bay.
You have slain the vandalous imps. Report back to Lululo at the Golden Bazaar.
Lululo is still troubled over the lack of progress due to the beasts in the area. She is convinced it will take a good deal of time before mining begins.

dialogue.name: LULULO
dialogue.text: I thought miners were hard and rugged souls. I had no idea they could be so craven! You look like someone who can handle herselfhimself. Care to kill some pests for a Lalafellin lady?

dialogue.name: LULULO
dialogue.text: I'm supposed to be leading a dig among the ruins east of here for mythril deposits. But once the miners I hired saw the vandalous imps in the area, they all turned tail and fled.

dialogue.name: LULULO
dialogue.text: Slay some of the bloody buggers for me, would you? Four dead imps should keep the others away and put the miners' minds at ease.

dialogue.name: LULULO
dialogue.text: You adventurers never cease to prove your worth. Now I can get those cowardly miners back to doing the only thing they're good forâ”€digging!

dialogue.name: LULULO
dialogue.text: The mythril veins are still no more than rumors, but if every miner flees at the slightest sign of danger, we'll never know for sure. I may need to hire you on a regular basis to cull those bloody imps.

dialogue.name: LULULO
dialogue.text: <sigh> I fear it will be quite a while yet before any proper mining can be done.
